result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Damien Md Scott

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: PLEA HEARING Transcript commencing 02-08-2016 received and filed.  Original transcript in case file 15CF4444 (24 Pages). CH

Defendant Damien Md Scott in court with attorney Maayan Silver.  Defendant Damien Md Scott in custody.  Tyrone Martin St. Junior appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy court clerk:  vk  Case in court as a read in on 15CF4444.

Correction made to entry made on March 1, 2016, entry indicates attorney Daniel McMurray appeared when attorney Maayan Silver actually appeared.  There are multiple attorneys listed on this case.  Case is tabbed to Vacancy Branch 4.

Attorney Maayan Silver in court, defendant Damien Md Scott not in court, in custody.  James C Griffin appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court is in trial.    Case adjourned for status conference in Branch 26.  Status conference scheduled for March 28, 2016 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Damien Md Scott in court with attorney Maayan Silver.  James C Griffin appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  

Pursuant to plea negotiations and on motion of the State, Court ordered COUNTS 1 & 2 dismissed and read-in to case for the purposes of sentencing.    Court ordered case adjourned for status conference in Branch 26.  Status conference scheduled for March 1, 2016 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Damien Md Scott in court with attorney Daniel Mcmurray.  Margaret Anne Kunisch appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Case in court for status conference. Defendant has another case pending 15CF5296 scheduled for 2/18/2016. Court ordered case adjourned for plea and sentencing in Branch 4.  Plea and sentencing scheduled for February 18, 2016 at 01:30 pm.

Attorney Patrick Dennis Wait in court, defendant Damien Md Scott not in court, in custody.  Alex T. Mueller appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy court clerk cmt.
Defendant not produced, appearance waived.  Statements by defense counsel that defendant has a pending felony case and is seeking a global resolution.  Defense requests a status conference date. Court orders case adjourned to Branch 45.  Status conference scheduled for February 4, 2016 at 01:30 pm.

Attorney Patrick Dennis Wait in court, defendant Damien Md Scott not in court, in custody.  Alex T. Mueller appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy court clerk cmt.
Defendant not produced.  Case heard off the record.  Defendant has pending felony cases.  Court ordered case adjourned for status conference in Branch 45.  Status conference scheduled for December 22, 2015 at 01:30 pm.

Attorney Patrick Dennis Wait in court, defendant Damien Md Scott not in court, in custody.  Alex T. Mueller appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Case calendared for plea/sentencing. Atty Wait informed the court of a pending felony in branch 26 for this defendant and requested to transfer this case. Court denied the request and adjourned this case in branch 45 until after the defendant's next felony appearance.  Status conference scheduled for November 10, 2015 at 01:30 pm.

Attorney Patrick Dennis Wait in court, defendant Damien Md Scott not in court, in custody.  Thomas L. Potter appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for November 5, 2015 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Damien Md Scott in court with attorney Patrick Dennis Wait.  Morgan Wilz, student intern, under the supervision of Alex T. Mueller appeared for the State of Wisconsin. For reasons stated on the record, the Court granted the defense request for an adjournment. Defendant reminded to follow all the previously set conditions of bail. Case adjourned to Branch 23. All parties are notified that effective September 14, 2015 this case will be assigned to Judge Michelle Ackerman Havas, Branch 45, in Room 515 of the Courthouse due to the rotation of Judge Grady in Branch 23.  Plea hearing scheduled for October 1, 2015 at 08:30 am.
Plea hearing on August 27, 2015 at 08:30 am.
Attorney Wait in court.  Court is not in session 8-27-2015 at 1:30 pm.   Case now scheduled for 8-27-15 at 8:30 am in Branch 23.

Defendant Damien Md Scott in court with attorney Patrick Dennis Wait.  Morgan Wills, appears as intern for the state under the student practice rule under the supervision of  Joanne L Hardtke appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy court clerk cmt.
Pretrial conference held.  Defense requests a projected guilty plea date. Court ordered case adjourned to Branch 23.  Parties are notified that effective August 3, 2015 this case will be reassigned per rotation to Judge Lindsey Grady, Branch 23 in Courthouse room 515.  Plea hearing scheduled for August 27, 2015 at 01:30 pm.

Court ordered no possession or use of controlled substances without a valid prescription, no dangerous weapons or firearms.
Court advised defendant that failure to comply with conditions of bail may result in an additional charge of bail jumping.

Defendant Damien Md Scott in court.  Brad Alan Vorpahl appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Defendant advised that this case is assigned to Reserve Judge, Branch 46.
Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause.   Defendant received a copy of the complaint and was advised of right to counsel and maximum penalties.  Court entered a plea of not guilty on behalf of the Defendant. Court reserves Defendant's right to file a substitution of judge pursuant to Sec. 971.20 until Defendant's next scheduled court appearance.  Defendant IS Public Defender eligible.  Defendant is ordered to provide the public defender's office with the next court date.  The case is adjourned to Br. 46  for a Pretrial Conference.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for June 29, 2015 at 01:30 pm.

ADDRESS INFO for Damien Md Scott
Current: 5132 N 57th Street, Milwaukee, WI 53218   (Effective: 06-24-2015)
Prior: 7029 W. Silver Spring Drive #5, Milwaukee, WI 53218
SUMMONS MAILED. DEFENDANT ORDERED INTO ROOM 221 SAFETY BUILDING ON 6/24/15 @ 1:30 pm
